evidence.claim: InfuCare Rx utilizes AWS for their cloud services, offering scalability and performance.
The company ensures HIPAA compliance to protect patient health information in their systems.
InfuCare Rx implements HL7 standards for healthcare data exchange, ensuring interoperability with EHRs.
The use of REST APIs allows seamless integration with healthcare systems and EHRs.
They have a structured approach to data integration using event-driven architecture.

icp.icp_reason: InfuCare Rx focuses on patient care and billing, indicating use of X12 transactions.
